title: Montage Unveils First Interoperable Video Interviewing Platform Customized For Global Enterprise
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/18/2015 @ 12:00 PM   Montage 
LAS VEGAS, Oct. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Montage , the leader of purpose-built video interviewing solutions to the Global 5000, has unveiled the first interoperable video interviewing platform that seamlessly fits the requirements of the global enterprise while matching the expectations of today's job candidates and modern talent acquisition. The announcement was made at the 2015 HR Technology Conference and Expo in Las Vegas, NV. 
This advancement builds upon Montage's live interviewing technology used across 180 countries for more than one million hiring interactions. Recognizing the importance of the candidate experience and compatibility with client IT standards, Montage now gives clients a choice of live video platforms, including WebRTC, for the video interviewing experience. Other video interviewing providers typically offer clients a single option, which may not be supported by all web browsers and require additional downloads. 
"Montage's innovative design accommodates preferred technology and global IT infrastructure requirements, which is exactly what today's large enterprises need," explained Mir Ali, Vice President, Global Technology Solutions at Futurestep. "This flexible approach allows companies to deliver a more user-friendly candidate experience while minimizing potential IT concerns and involvement," he added. 
"Talent Acquisition teams depend on purpose-built solutions for benefits far beyond general chat or conference tools, and IT departments require security, ease-of-use, scalability and interoperability within the enterprise," explained Kurt Heikkinen, President and CEO of Montage. "By giving our clients their choice of video platforms for the live interview experience, Montage is the first to take this step toward interoperability with any video standard," he added. 
About Montage Montage offers the most mature video and voice interviewing solution available, purpose-built to transform the hiring experience one smile at a time. Applying an enterprise software-as-a-service (SaaS) model, Montage is the global solution of choice for companies pursuing a hiring advantage. By extending talent reach, elevating employer brand, reducing travel, and minimizing costs, Montage engages candidates and hiring teams throughout the process, driving faster decisions and improving quality of hire. Montage is used by the world's largest employers in more than 180 countries and translated in 18 languages. A privately held company, Montage is headquartered in Wisconsin. For more information, visit www.montagetalent.com .
